channel.title: Authors on Kelly McGlynn
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Kelly McGlynn

item.description:
I’m a biochemist and cancer biologist with a research background in epigenetic mechanisms driving cancer transformation. During my time in the lab, I’ve enjoyed applying my diverse technical skill set to research problems and implementing new methods. Currently, I’m putting my skills to use creating a new CRISPR/Cas9 knockout cell line while working on R & Python data science projects! When Iâ€™m not at the bench, I enjoy cooking, traveling, and indoor gardening.

Updated Oct. 16th, 2019
